title: Associate Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager who will own the roadmap and work with engineering. Requirements: PRDs, stakeholder management, agile, user stories, backlog prioritization, and experience with SDLC. Must work with cross-functional teams.

title: Product Manager
description: Drive product strategy and roadmap. You will write PRDs, run sprints, and collaborate with design and engineering. Experience with Agile and Scrum required. Nice to have: API design, user research.

title: Business Analyst
description: Gather requirements, document processes, and support product owners. Knowledge of JIRA and Confluence. Must have 2+ years in business analysis or product support.

title: Technical Program Manager
description: Manage cross-functional programs. You will need experience with roadmap planning, risk management, and stakeholder communication. PMP or similar certification preferred. 8+ years experience.

title: Senior Product Manager
description: Lead product for a key vertical. 5+ years PM experience, PRDs, roadmap, go-to-market. Must have led a team.

title: Product Owner
description: Own the backlog and work with Scrum team. Create user stories, accept criteria, and run sprint ceremonies. Experience with Agile/Scrum and stakeholder management required.

title: Marketing Coordinator
description: Support marketing campaigns and social media. No product or technical experience required.
